projects.title: Project Zukes
projects.bodyText:
- A multiplayer co-op survival horror game being developed using Unreal Engine 5.4, where players capture ghosts and collect items to progress.
 - All 3D Models and animations are created using Blender 4.0.
 - Implemented network replication for seamless multiplayer experiences.
 - Designed procedural generation systems to create varied and dynamic dungeons.

projects.title: Spells & Potions, Inc.
projects.bodyText:
- Spells & Potions, Inc. is a 2D action survival game where you play as a wizard-in-training. The duties a wizard must take to advance his career is to go out, slay shadow spirits, and save civilians! The player will be able to craft potions to help them fight and survive.
 - This game was made for PirateSoftwares July 2024's game jam with a team of 5 artists and developers.

projects.title: Dungeons and Dragons Character Creator
projects.bodyText:
- Manipulated the DOM using vanilla Javascript functions in order to create an interactive single page environment.
 - Utilized CSS in order to stylize an interesting and unique design.
 - Fetched data from an external API to display information that aids users to make decisions in character creation.

projects.title: Event Management System
projects.bodyText:
- Full CRUD was implemented to allow users to utilize routes for manipulating event data.
 - Added validations in each form so data being created stays consistent with written constraints.
 - Developed with ReactJS and Ruby on Rails to create a full stack application.

projects.title: Roleplay Chat
projects.bodyText:
- Implemented full authentication and authorization to ensure user security.
 - Used ActionCable to create a bi-directional communication between server and client.
 - Utilized cookies to store encrypted user data to keep the user signed in when they re-visit.

projects.title: EDM Concert API
projects.bodyText:
- Designed and developed a backend API, enabling seamless integration for other developers to incorporate EDM concert data into their projects.
 - Implemented full CRUD functionality to manage a comprehensive database of EDM events.
